content: crochet lucky 7 baby blanket is an easy filet from the middle blanket that works up easily perfect for those spring and summer newborns i used bernat® bundle up™ yarn for this lovely blanket it is oeko-tex® certified and are tested for over 300 harmful substances so great for your baby s sensitive skin this pattern would crochet up nicely with any yarn so don t feel limited just match your hook size to your yarn and you ll be good to go i call this lucky 7 because you will find yourself counting to 7 over and over it has an easy 4 round repeat that grows a bit each round don t let the 3 page pdf scare you after the 12th round most will see the repeat and not need the pattern i do like to include stitch counts when i can for those that prefer to check their work
